hero.title: Want to travel?
hero.description: Turn your travel dreams into reality: plan, explore, and create unforgettable memories.

explore.title: Easily explore destinations
explore.trainDescription: Hop on a train adventure and explore destinations worldwide. Whether it's beautiful landscapes, bustling cities, or cultural gems, our train services offer a unique and comfortable way to travel around the world. Immerse yourself in diverse cultures through our extensive train network!
explore.planeTitle: Discover exciting offers for air travel
explore.planeDescription: Embark on an airborne adventure and explore destinations worldwide. Whether it's thrilling landscapes, vibrant cities, or cultural treasures, our airline services provide convenience and an excellent way to travel globally. Dive into diverse cultures with easy access to our vast air travel network.

discover.title: Explore Our Destinations
discover.subtitle: Discover Dubai, Turkey, and Sharm El Sheikh with us

destination1.name: Feel the luxury in Dubai
destination1.description: The harmony of city and desert
destination1.longDescription: Enjoy the luxury of Dubai's skyscrapers, shopping, and desert adventures. Discover the blend of culture and opulence in a city where modernity meets tradition.

destination2.name: Discover Turkish Culture
destination2.longDescription: Dive into Turkey’s rich history, from ancient ruins to vibrant markets. Experience the beauty, delicious food, and warm hospitality that make Turkey a must-visit destination.

destination3.name: Relax in Sharm El Sheikh
destination3.longDescription: Explore the stunning beaches and coral reefs of Sharm El Sheikh. Dive into crystal-clear waters, relax at luxury resorts, and experience the best of tropical relaxation.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Explore with confidence
services.experienceDescription: Discover curated travel routes tailored to your desires, ensuring unforgettable adventures by experts.
services.bestRoutesDescription: Enjoy fully customized travel plans that match your unique interests and preferences, reflecting your travel aspirations.
services.packagesDescription: Our packages ensure a seamless blend of convenience, adventure, and cultural immersion, providing an exceptional travel experience.

travelAccordion.title: Plan Your Dream Trip
travelAccordion.description: We take care of every detail when you're on your dream trip, whether it's a cultural getaway, an adventurous expedition, or a beachside retreat. We're here to ensure a seamless and unforgettable travel experience.

items.title: Experienced Guides Service
items.content: Get advice from our passionate travel experts who are eager to create the perfect itinerary for you. From destination suggestions to travel tips, we’re here to make your journey amazing.

items.title: Flexible Services
items.content: Tailor your travel experience with customized options, ensuring every aspect of your trip aligns with your preferences. Choose accommodations, activities, and more that match your unique style.

items.title: 24/7 Support
items.content: Feel at ease with our 24/7 customer support service. Whether you have questions during the planning process or need help during your trip, our team is always here to assist you.

footer.description: Conquer the world with us. Your best partner in organizing travel.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: Get ready for your next trip and contact us for personal travel assistance and inquiries.
